node.detail_zh: 患者與早前確診的第 238、242、261 及 268 宗個案患者一同去加拿大，並參與黃刀鎮的一個旅行團，曾到訪秘魯及玻利維亞等地。患者於 3 月 3 日開始發燒及咳嗽。
node.detail_en: The patient went to Canada with patients no. 238, 242, 261 and 268.   They joined a local tour in Yellow Knife Town, and went to Peru and Bolivia.   The patient started having fever and coughing since Mar 3.

groups.description_zh: 7 名港人同遊加拿大，期間參加了當地本地團前往黃刀鎮、玻利維亞、秘魯、亞馬遜河等，返港後多名團員確診。
groups.description_en: 7 Hongkongers touring to Canada and further to Yellowknife, Bolivia, Peru and Amazon were confirmed infected upon return to Hong Kong.

node.location_zh: 加拿大航空 AC007 ( 座位 29G )

node.remarks_zh: 與早前確診的第238、242、261及268號個案一同去加拿大，並參與黃刀鎮的一個旅行團。
node.remarks_en: Joined a tour at Yellowknife, Canada with patient no. 238, 242, 261, 268.

node.remarks_zh: 與早前確診的第238、242、261及268號個案一同去加拿大，並參與黃刀鎮的一個旅行團。
node.remarks_en: Joined a tour at Yellowknife, Canada with patient no. 238, 242, 261, 268.
Developed fever and cough since Mar 3, is part of Bolivia Tour Cluster (cases #238, #242, #261, #262, #268 & #301)
